name: struggle-bug
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sword-shield: While resisting, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stats of those hit.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user struggles against the target, dealing damage. This also lowers the target's offensive stats.
